text:
#Bollywood actor #ArjunRampal (@rampalarjun) has tested negative for #Covid19. The actor had been battling the #virus for almost a week, and he says he managed to recover so quickly because he had already taken the first dose of the #vaccine.

Read: https://t.co/TtNwQA2f0l https://t.co/WLC7x1vgJ7
